author: Matt Bassil
description:
I’ve played more matches on Pokémon TCG Pocket’s ranked ladder this season than the last two combined. Its fast-paced matches fill every five minute gap in my day as I push the boulder up the mountain track leading to Master Ball. The trouble is, the only deck I want to play is distinctly off-meta… perhaps not even all that good.

Continue reading I'm hopelessly addicted to this mediocre Pokémon Pocket deck
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How many Pokémon are there?, How to play Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards
title: I'm hopelessly addicted to this mediocre Pokémon Pocket deck

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Dungeons and Dragons has announced that it’s shifting to a franchise model, with Hasbro’s former senior VP of digital games leading the charge as the new head of D&D. Ayoub shared the news in a LinkedIn post on July 9, saying: “We shifted our structure internally and D&D moved to a full franchise model, meaning everything: books, video games, film, and TV – everything touching the franchise lives under one roof.”

Continue reading Former Halo exec takes over DnD, says it's moving to a "full franchise model"
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: Former Halo exec takes over DnD, says it's moving to a "full franchise model"

author: Chloe Ward
description:
Bravo Amazon, you’ve done it again! Right now, Lorcana fans can get the Disney Lorcana Ursula's Return Illumineer's Trove, containing 8 booster packs, for the delightful price of $39.98/£31.99. That's a 36% discount for Brits and a 20% for Americans. Ursula’s Return is the fourth set in the Lorcana TCG and centres around our favourite fork-loving red-headed princess, Ariel. If you are fast, there will be no poor unfortunate souls, just happy card owners.

Continue reading Nab an 8 booster pack Disney Lorcana bundle nice and cheap in the Amazon sale
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games, Best cheap board games under $30, Best card games
title: Nab an 8 booster pack Disney Lorcana bundle nice and cheap in the Amazon sale

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Pets and Sidekicks, a new third-party supplement for D&D and adjacent RPG systems, launched its Kickstarter campaign on July 8. This compendium is entirely dedicated to companions, who will level up and evolve alongside their humanoid buddies with Pets and Sidekicks’ new rules. There are over 170 fleshed-out companions inside, from the humble rat to the Dwarf Wrestler.

Continue reading New DnD pets book turns the party's polar bear into a fully fleshed-out sidekick
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: New DnD pets book turns the party's polar bear into a fully fleshed-out sidekick

author: Timothy Linward
description:
If you’ve had your eyes on one of the enormous, beautifully sculpted Warhammer JoyToy action figures, but have been holding off for a decent discount, now might be the time. Loads of the range is available for 20% off to Amazon Prime subscribers as part of the Amazon Prime Day promotion, including $30 off the utterly enormous Redemptor Dreadnought.

Continue reading Get $30 off a Warhammer mini the size of a watermelon for Amazon Prime day
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: Get $30 off a Warhammer mini the size of a watermelon for Amazon Prime day

author: Matt Bassil
description:
What are the most expensive Pokemon cards in the world? After over 25 years of regular Pokémon TCG releases, there are quite a few staggeringly valuable cards out there. YouTuber Logan Paul famously blew over $5 million on a Pikachu Illustrator in 2022, but that's just the tip of the iceberg.

We've searched online auction houses and scoured Pokémon history to find the 54 most valuable rare Pokémon cards ever sold.

Continue reading Top 50 most expensive rare Pokémon cards of all time
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets in order
title: Top 50 most expensive rare Pokémon cards of all time

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Mansions of Madness, a thematic horror board game set in a Lovecraftian world of eldritch horror, has a killer discount right now at Walmart and Amazon. A copy of the game’s beloved second edition currently sells for $54.97, almost 40% less than the usual $89.95. If you love rich, tense mysteries, app-driven puzzles, and spooky storytelling, then this is a steal.

Continue reading Lovecraft board game Mansions of Madness sees massive 38% discount
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games, Board games for adults
title: Lovecraft board game Mansions of Madness sees massive 38% discount

author: Chloe Ward
description:
Ah yes, Amazon Prime Day is here once again, and nestled amongst the batterie sand cat food deals are a plethora of treasures waiting to be discovered, especially if you’re a Lego Star Wars fan. From the mighty Imperial Star Destroyer to the charming BrickHeadz sets, Prime Day has delivered some strong deals (maybe stronger than Beskar) - here’s our expert opinion on the best deals.

Continue reading These Lego Star Wars deals are out of this galaxy - hurry, you don't have long
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Biggest LEGO sets, LEGO sets for adults, Best Star Wars LEGO sets
title: These Lego Star Wars deals are out of this galaxy - hurry, you don't have long

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The Magic: The Gathering card Beacon of Immortality has become a mainstay in one of the most distinct EDH decks from the Final Fantasy UB release. Now, 10th edition copies of the card have doubled in value, going from $9.50 to $18.80 in just under a month.

Continue reading Bizarre life-gain MTG card doubles in price thanks to Final Fantasy
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: Bizarre life-gain MTG card doubles in price thanks to Final Fantasy
